txt.en: 'It is done!\n\n'Take this meillionen salve and these bandages to the wounded miners and bind their wounds, then return to me.'
'Thank you, [placeholder]. I will call you duvodiad no more.'
Helping the Hurt
'Ah! Yes, these will do nicely. It will take but a moment to finish the salve, then I will have more for you to do.'
'Have you found any red clover yet?'
Collected red clover at Hen Turrau ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You have my gratitude, duvodiad.'
'Leave me be, duvodiad!'
Red clover can be found in the hills near the mine, particularly at Hen Turrau.\n\nMelvun has asked you to collect red clover which he can use to make medicines for the injured miners.
'I am feeling better already. Thank you.'
Melvun is at the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should bring the red clover you collected to Melvun.
'What do you want, duvodiad?'
Melvun is at the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should speak with Melvun again to see if he has finished the salve.
'I am not sure Melvun's medicine will work...my wounds are terrible. Nevertheless, you have my thanks, Duvodiad.'
The wounded miners can be found in the camp outside the Barnavon Mine.\n\nMelvun asked you to take the salve and bandages to the wounded miners and bind their wounds.
'I have never seen such creatures...they shall be the death of me.'
Melvun is at the Barnavon Mine.\n\nYou should speak with Melvun and let him know that you have completed his task.'
'I do not think I would have survived if you had not come....'
'What are you doing here, Duvodiad?'
'What wonder is this? Thank Melvun for me.'
'I do not wish to speak with you.'
'The gratitude of the Turch-lûth goes with you.'
'What have I to do with you?'
Collect red clover at Hen Turrau ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the red clover to Melvun at the mine
Talk to Melvun at the mine
Bring the bandages and salve to the wounded miners ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Brought the bandages and salve to the wounded miners ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Melvun at the mine
'I am not sure Melvun's medicine will work... my wounds are terrible. Nevertheless, you have my thanks, duvodiad.'
'I have never seen such creatures... they shall be the death of me.'
'I do not think I would have survived if you had not come....'
'What are you doing here, duvodiad?'
'The gratitude of the Turch-lûth goes with you.'
'What have I to do with you?'
'What wonder is this? Thank Melvun for me.'
'I do not wish to speak with you.'
The Barnavon Mine has been infested by bugan who are terrorizing the miners. Many of the workers have been injured or slain, while the rest have been driven out of the mine.
'I am feeling better already. Thank you.'
'What do you want, Duvodiad?'

'What? Who are you? You have come to help? That is well, for we are in great need of aid, and the accursed Ox-dung will not see fit to lend it!

'The mine has been overrun by bugan. They came out of nowhere and fell upon us as we laboured. We were able to fight our way out, but not without loss. Many are wounded, many dead.

'We are in need of medicine, duvodiad. Red clover grows in the hills near the mine, especially around Hen Turrau. Would you collect some and bring it here to me?'
